overview: Most Welcome 2 is a Bangladeshi action film written by and directed by Ananta Jalil. It is considered to be one of the most expensive films in the history of Bengali cinema. Development began in February 2012. The film is a sequel of 2012 blockbuster Most Welcome, The film released in 2014. The film stars Ananta Jalil and Barsha in leading roles.
title: Most Welcome 2
